docs.lead_paragraph: As European Union leaders began a two-day meeting in Brussels, finance officials were working on urgent measures to diminish financial market pressure on Spain and Italy.

headline.seo: Markets Trim Losses as Leaders Move on European Debt

docs.abstract: Stocks fall but pare back sharp losses amid talk of progress by European leaders in easing the euro zone debt crisis.
docs.snippet: As European Union leaders began a two-day meeting in Brussels, finance officials were working on urgent measures to diminish financial market pressure on Spain and Italy.

headline.main: 'It Is Not Our Role to Forbid It, or to Pass Upon Its Wisdom'

docs.lead_paragraph: There are lots of taxes that people pay only if they buy something -- sales taxes, taxes on cigarettes and taxes on airline tickets among them. But by calling the penalty for not buying health insurance a tax, the Supreme Court on Thursday effectively created a tax that people will pay only if they do not buy something.

headline.main: Justices Allow the Term 'Tax' to Embrace 'Penalty'

docs.abstract: Supreme Court, by considering the penalty for not buying health insurance a tax, effectively creates a tax that people will pay only if they do not buy something; decision leads some opponents of the health care law to proclaim that it is a large tax increase, something the sponsors of the bill had explicitly denied when the law was passed; to some extent, calling it a tax breaks new ground. Photo (M)
